TestCase.Title: Check if the ePassport is unprotected (PLAIN)
TestCase.Purpose: Try to identifying if the connected ePassport is unprotected (Plain ePassport)

Precondition.Description: Perform a cold reset of the card in order to ensure all temporary data is removed.

TestStep.Description: Select the ePassport application with a plain SelectApplication APDU

Command.Text: Select file EF.DG1 with file ID

TestStep.Description: Select the file EF.DG1 with a plain select APDU
TestStep.TechnicalCommand: command = new ByteString("00 A4 02 0C 02 01 01", HEX); card.gt_sendCommand(command);

Command.Text: Send read binary command to read the first byte of EF.DG1

TestStep.Description: Send read binary command to read first byte of EF.DG1. First byte must be '61'
TestStep.TechnicalCommand: command = new ByteString("00 B0 00 00 01", HEX); var dg1 = card.gt_sendCommand(command);

ExpectedResult.TechnicalResult: assertStatusWord(SW_NoError, card.SW.toString(HEX), FAILURE); assertMatchValue("61", dg1, FAILURE);
